chat.msg: hey!!! ya comenzamos?
Yo!
Boy, here I am at square one.
I see a branch to my left that leads to an island with a tiger. where should i go from here?
Go past the tiger until you see a bird or a forest
alright, i've gone past the tiger and i can see a big ol' island with a parrot who looks like he's having a great time
do i head towards the parrot next?
Go to the right and you should see a frog next
sweet, i see the frog! but uh
there's a croc to the left. should i keep going?
Yes go past the croc until you see a giraffe
brilliant, i see long-necked cutie (the giraffe) ! do i sidle past him next?
Keep going south until you see a snake
Claro, ahora veo la serpiente.
es un niño pequeño y retorcido. ¿Adónde debo ir ahora?
Keep going right. Sigue a la derecha, deberias ver el tesoro
lo logré, amigo! i see the treasure, we made it! *finished* thanks for your help!
hi there, empezamos?
Sure
¡impresionante! Ahora, primero, da unos pasos hacia el oeste desde nuestro amigo perrito blanco.
Continúe hasta pasar un banco de madera y encontrar un pequeño sendero. ¿entiendo?
Ok I see the path and next to it is some flowers
cool! but don't go to the flowers
instead, take a sharp left u-turn, pass the trail again and head back towards our white doggie friend
Ok I am back to the dog
¡gran trabajo! ahora, cruza el ramal hacia el sur y continúa en esa dirección.
hay otro perro blanco merodeando por ahí
Ok I am next to a door and a picnic basket
buen trabajo! ahora ve por encima de la alfombra tratando de rozar esas deliciosas berries y sigue en dirección oeste
Ok I am next to some fishes where do I go next
ah, ahora busquemos esa rama de madera y cruce el río hacia el norte
¿estás ahí?
I went north and I an near a bridge
fantástico! ahora, veo un arbusto verde y quiero que lo evitemos
¿cómo? rodeándolo por la derecha hasta que llegues al puesto de la florista
Ok I am at the flower shop
genial! ahora, da la vuelta por la izquierda, pasa por debajo de la tienda de flores y camina hacia el puente
Ok I am at the bridge near a vegetable stand
¡perfecto! no subas al puente, en lugar de eso, pasa por el oeste del mismo
I see an old married couple
muy bien! sigue hacia el sur, entre ellos y otra rama de madera, ¿lo ves?
I see a deer yes
fantastic, before you reach the deer, find the green bush next to the end of the wooden branch, do you see it?
I see the green bush yes
maravilloso! ahora, dirígete al este, entre la rama y el arbusto
hey there, estas listo?
Ok I am ready
perfecto
i'm at the tent up north. where to next buddy?
Go south and you should see a dog
Lo tengo, acabo de pasar al perro.
Hace frío al lado del fuego. ¿que sigue?
Ok now you go east and you should see a mushroom and a fire
alright, spotted the red mushroom on the right of the fire
which way now, amigo?
Cool now you go south and you should pass an aqua car
gotcha
just passed by the nice blue car. where to now?
keep going south and you should see a telescope
right on! found the telescope
which direction next?
From the telescope, go west and you should find it inside of some rocks on the green
found the house! *finished* thanks for the direction, buddy!
hi there! que comience el juego!!
Hey read to start
awesome! so, you're starting by the three palm trees, right? now move southwest under the first palm tree, then take a smooth right and pass the second tree
before you get to the third tree, strike a sharp left heading south. got it?
Got it. I see a dog and a rock
perfect! now, swerve a little to the left around that cute brown puppy
then, veer right, heading south. see those rocks ahead? you'll need to go between them
I am between the rocks now
¡buen trabajo! Ahora, dirígete directamente hacia el agua.
No te preocupes, no te mojarás. todavía
I am in the water chilling now what
¡radical! pero sigamos
¿Ves el gran cangrejo rojo? Gira a la derecha después de él y sigue la gran roca hacia el oeste.
I see a shark now am I going the right way
oh sí, ¡estás en lo cierto! Ahora, gira a la derecha al ver a nuestro amigo con aletas.
¡Continúa, lo estás haciendo genial!
I see another rock now what
nice! now, you will need to glide back towards the land
Ok I am at a boat or cano
good job! now scoot past the red kayak on the right and gear yourself south till you hit the shore
from there, hook a right and follow the west line under the kayak
Ok I see a volleyball now what
¡magnífico! no recojas la pelota todavía
pásalo a tu derecha y sigue hacia el norte.
Ok I see a tent and a speaker
perfect! just keep on going, and navigate yourself between the red tent and that large speaker
make it look smooth!
Ok I am between both items now what
¡gran trabajo! Ahora, curva hacia la izquierda alrededor de la tienda formando un bonito arco como un elegante cisne.
sigue moviéndote hacia el sur después de eso
Ok I see another rock now what
great! but this time, don't mind the rock
we're not going near it
Ok I moved south and I see some grass
perfecto! ¿les ves a la orilla del agua? gira a la derecha y quédate en esa dirección hasta que pases el kayak rojo

general_survey.answer: I liked it. It kept me on edge and thinking ahead
general_survey.question: Any final comments about your partner’s language switching?

general_survey.answer: I am still learning so I am not that good with Spanish or Japanese but it was easy to figure it out with the flow and conversation. Thank you.
general_survey.question: Any final comments about your language background?
